text: Rasputin Dreamweaver was a human wizard and ally of the Knights of Thorn on Terisiare , Dominara . Rasputin was a wizard who aided Tivadar and the Knights of Thorn in temporarily restoring civilization to Terisiare by throwing back the Goblin Invasions with their Crusade. They led a campaign against the goblins and orcs of Terisiare. This brought a close to the Dark Age . Rasputin has been the only character thus far to use Dream counters .
